PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(S2) ... shikaree 猎人 shikari 猎人 Shikoku 四国.

derivation.yuyuan_name: via Urdu from Persian šikārī 'of hunting'

auth_sentence.content: Mika Mika sails to the top of a list including Klaxons and Enter Shikari.
auth_sentence.res_content: Mika Mika sails to the top of a list including Klaxons and Enter Shikari.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Mika Mika sails to the top of a list including Klaxons and Enter Shikari.

auth_sentence.content: Occasionally there are flashes of Linkin Park or The Prodigy, but mostly this is a sound all Enter Shikari's very own.
auth_sentence.res_content: Occasionally there are flashes of Linkin Park or The Prodigy, but mostly this is a sound all Enter Shikari's very own.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Occasionally there are flashes of Linkin Park or The Prodigy, but mostly this is a sound all Enter Shikari's very own.

auth_sentence.content: That is set to change with the release of local foursome Enter Shikari's spankingly brilliant second album Common Dreads.
